SDK Examples - Overview

Special SDK Examples for microEnable IV GigE Vision Series
. QuadAreaBayer24

Acquisition using line scan camera, bayer pattern, 8bit pixel input; 4 camera port

QuadAreaGray16

Example which shows how to work with gray scale area-scan image input data of 16bit; 4 camera port

QuadAreaGray8

Acquisition using area scan camera, gray scale, 8bit pixel; 4 camera port

QuadAreaRGB24

Acquisition using area scan camera, RGB, 24bit pixel; 4 camera port

. QuadLineGray16

Acquisition using line scan camera, gray scale, 16bit pixel; 4 camera port

QuadLineGray8

Acquisition using line scan camera, gray scale, 8bit pixel; 4 camera port

CameraDetection

Detecting connected GigE Vision cameras

GbeEvents Using GigE Vision and SDK events
GbeActionCommands Using GigE Vision action command
GbeForceIP Forcing camera's IP address
GbeInternalGenicam Accessing the GenAPI Nodemap of a camera

General SDK Examples for microEnable IV products
. ConfigFileInit

Usage of a configuration file (*.mcf) in conbination with Fg_Init().

. ConfigFileLoad

Example to show how to load a configuration file after initialization.

Gray8

Example which shows how to work with gray scale image input data of 8 bit.

Gray16

Acquisition with gray scale images of 16 bit.

RGB24

Color scale acquisition with 24 bit.

. MediumGray

Acquisition of gray scale images in Medium Configuration.

MediumGray16

Gray scale acquisiton in Medium Configuration of 16 bit.

MediumRGB24

Example for color scale acquisition in Medium Configuration of 24 bit.

. MediumRGB48

Acquisition in Medium Configuration of 48 bit color scale.

QuadAreaGray8

This is a new SDK example for the microEnable IV GigE Vision series.

It shows a simple application for gray scale acquisition
with an area-scan camera with GigabitEthernet interface.

. SensorReadout

Usage of SensorReadout functionality for resorting the tap data.

. KneeLutGray

Demonstration of a Knee Look-up table with usage of a gray scale camera.

KneeLutGrayFile

Knee Look-up table example for a gray scale camera by loading a file.

. KneeLutRGB

Demonstration of a Knee Look-up table with usage of a color scale camera.

. KneeLutRGBFile

Knee Look-up table example for a color scale camera by loading a file.

. GetParameter

Example to show how to use the get parameter function.

. SetParameter

Example to show how to use the get parameter function.

. ImageTag

Demonstration of the image tag functionality.
Each image has its own / special tag - the image tag.

. TimeStamps

Usage of a time stamp.

. AreaFreeRun

Acquisition with an area-scan camera in free running mode.

AreaGrabberControl Acquisition with an area-scan camera in grabber controlled mode.

. AreaSoftware

Acquisition with an area-scan camera and usage of the software trigger.

AreaExternal

Acquisition with an area-scan camera and usage of the external trigger.

LineStartTriggerLine Example of a line-scan camera application with line trigger setting.

LineGrabberControlledLine

Example of a line-scan camera application with line trigger setting in grabber controlled mode.

LineGatedGrabberControlledLine

Example of a line-scan camera application with line trigger setting in gated grabber controlled mode.

LineGatedAsyncTriggerLine

Example of a line-scan camera application with line trigger setting in asynchronous trigger mode.

. LineFreeRunImg

Example of a line-scan camera application with line trigger setting in free running mode.

. LineStartTriggerImg

Example of a line-scan camera application with image trigger setting.

. LineTriggerGatedImg

Example of a line-scan camera application with single gated image trigger mode.
. AllocMem

Demonstration of memory allocation with Fg_AllocMem().

AllocMemEx

Demonstration of memory allocation with the newer function Fg_AllocMemEx().

AllocUserMem

Example for user memory.

AcqStandard

Acquisition with standard acquisition mode.

AcqBlock

Acquisition with explanation of the blocking acquisition mode.
. AcqAPC

Acquisition with APC (Asynchronous Procedure Call).
Events Example for using the SDK event interface.
Info Example for querying system information about the frame grabber system.

SDK Examples for microEnable 5 CoaXPress Series
. CXP_Discovery

Example for using the automatic camera discovery and retrieving camera info
CXP_Manual_Link_Configuration Example for manual link configuration (link topology and link speed) by application software
AreaFreeRun Acquisition with an area-scan camera in free-run mode.
AreaGrabberControl Acquisition with an area-scan camera in grabber controlled mode.
